DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare level cleanliness use HyGIeaCare Prep v standard care Split-dose PEG prep use prior colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: HyGIeaCare Prep v Split-dose PEG Prep Prior Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: The level cleanliness record use Boston Bowel Prep Score ( BBPS ) endoscopist blind randomized preparation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient refer colonoscopy 2 . Patient high probability poor prep due one following : 1 . Chronic constipation ( Rome III functional constipation criterion ) 2 . Gastroparesis 3 . Immobilization 4 . Diabetes 5 . History poor prep 1 . Patient condition , opinion investigator , may adversely affect compliance safety patient would limit patient 's ability complete study . 2 . Patient currently take narcotic . 3 . Patient contraindication list : 1 . Cardiac : Congestive heart failure ( NYHA class III IV EF < 50 % ) 2 . GI : Intestinal perforation , carcinoma rectum , fissure fistula , severe hemorrhoid , abdominal hernia , recent colon rectal surgery , abdominal surgery 3 . GU : Renal insufficiency ( CC < 60 ml/min/173m2 ) , cirrhosis ascites 4 . Abdominal surgery within last 6 month 5 . Pregnancy
